Macros

#define VPS_DISP_INST_MAX   (4U)
 Max Number of disp instances for error check.
 
DSS Display Instance ID's

Below are the global requirements which are met by this ADC driver which can't be mapped to a particular source ID DES_ID : DOX_DES_TAG(DES_VPS_DSS_021) DOX_DES_TAG(DES_VPS_DSS_001) REQ_ID : DOX_REQ_TAG(PDK-1793) DOX_REQ_TAG(PDK-788) DOX_REQ_TAG(PDK-99)

#define VPSDRV_DISP_INST_DSS_VID1   (0U)
 Video Pipeline 1 display driver instance number.
 
#define VPSDRV_DISP_INST_DSS_VID2   (1U)
 Video Pipeline 2 display driver instance number.
 
#define VPSDRV_DISP_INST_DSS_VID3   (2U)
 Video Pipeline 3 display driver instance number. This video instance is not applicable for TDA3xx platform.
 
#define VPSDRV_DISP_INST_DSS_GFX1   (3U)
 Graphics Pipeline 1 display driver instance number.

Detailed Description

Baremetal interface file for DSS Display driver. Caution: This library cannot co-exist with VPS RTOS driver.

Function Documentation

Get capture params for specified handle. If not configured, this will return a default configuration.
